title: Crippling droughts & floods discussed at Free Climate Change Forum (Wollongong City Council)
text: ( Source : Wollongong City Council ) Internationally recognised Climate Change author Professor Lesley Hughes will be speaking at the Wollongong 's Forum on Climate Change at Wollongong Town Hall on 22 October . Prof Hughes is a former lead
